title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the target audience, desired features, technical specifications, and any relevant constraints or assumptions. This should cover both functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the virtual reality environment, character interactions, and story management.

title: Develop Virtual Reality Environment
description: Implement the virtual reality environment, including graphics, physics, and user interactions.

title: Implement Character Interactions
description: Develop the system for managing character interactions, including dialogue, animations, and decision-making.

title: Design Story Management System
description: Create a system for managing and presenting stories, including branching narratives and multiple perspectives.

title: Develop Database and Content Management
description: Implement a database and content management system for storing and retrieving story content, character data, and user progress.

title: Implement User Authentication and Profiles
description: Develop a system for user authentication, profiles, and progress tracking.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Create a user-friendly interface and experience for navigating the virtual world, selecting stories, and interacting with characters.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Develop security measures to protect user data, prevent unauthorized access, and ensure the integrity of the system.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for efficient development, testing, and deployment of the application.

title: Create Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan to ensure the application meets the required standards and specifications.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, APIs, and other technical aspects of the application for future reference and maintenance.
